title: This precise and portable color-matching widget is a great gift for DIYers, now under $60
content:
Macworld

When it comes to matching paint shades on your family home, “close” isn’t really good enough. That’s just one situation where you need a color sensor, and the Nix Mini 2 is one of the best.

Now is your chance to get this pocket-sized color-matching device for only $59.97 (reg. $99) through November 9th. It’s also an ideal gift for artists, designers, DIYers, and other creatives!

You don’t have to be a designer to use the Nix. Simply hold it up to any surface, including painted walls, vinyl, leather, plastic, fabric, dyes, and much more, and let its highly calibrated LED provide incredible color matching. The Nix (4.9-star rated by verified users!) even comes with its own light source for consistent color matches and can block out all ambient lighting to ensure perfect results.

Once your desired surface is scanned, the Nix Mini 2 can match the color to sRGB HEX, CMYK, and LAB colors, as well as over 100,000 name-brand paint colors. Users can even save their scans to Nix apps to look back on in the future. 

This holiday season, gift your favorite creative or DIYer the tool of their dreams.

Get the Nix Mini 2 Color Sensor for just $59.97. No coupon is necessary, but this exclusive offer ends November 9th at 11:59pm PT!
